Title: Protein globule without the unique three-dimensional structure: experimental data for alpha-lactalbumins and general model [Belkovye globuly bez unikal'noǐ prostranstvennoǐ struktury: eksperimental'nye dannye dlia al'fa-laktal'buminov i obshchaia model'.]

Authors: Grosberg, A.I., Erukhimovich, I.I., Shakhnovich, E.I.
Title: Theory of DNA compactization in a polymer solution [K teorii kompaktizatsii DNK v polimernom rastvore.]

Authors: Grosberg, A.I., Erukhimovich, I.I., Shakhnovich, E.I.
Title: On DNA compaction in diluted polymeric solutions [O kompaktizatsii DNK v razbavlennykh polimernykh rastvorakh.]

Authors: Shakhnovich, E.I.
Title: Fusion of heteropolymeric chains in a case in which the energy of cooperativity depends on the type of boundaries between the helical and coiled segments [O plavlenii geteropolimernykh tsepeǐ v sluchae, kogda énergiia kooperativenosti zavisit ot tipa granitsy mezhdu spiralizovannym i klubkovym uchastkami.]
